corrector.container

Class ImagePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • corrector.container.ImagePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ImagePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

    Title : ImagePanel

    this class display the image in the panel with the zoom effect


    Contact - Web Site
    See Also:

      • getPreferredSize

        public java.awt.Dimension getPreferredSize()
        This method is overridden to return the preferred size which will be the width and height of the image plus the zoomed width width and height. while zooming out the zoomed width and height is negative
        Overrides:
        getPreferredSize in class javax.swing.JComponent
        Returns:
        the dimension of the panel
